# TubeGrow (tubegrow.io)
#
# This file provides a compact, LLM-friendly summary of TubeGrow and the
# most important URLs. Replace or expand as the product evolves.

site: https://tubegrow.io
name: TubeGrow
type: SaaS for YouTube creators
language: en

summary:
TubeGrow is an AI-powered YouTube analytics and growth platform. It helps creators understand channel performance, get AI insights, optimize YouTube SEO (titles, descriptions, tags), and turn long videos into viral short-form clips. The product focuses on actionable insights, automation, and a modern creator-first workflow.

key-pages:
- Home: https://tubegrow.io/
- Features: https://tubegrow.io/features
- AI YouTube Tools: https://tubegrow.io/ai-youtube-tools
- Viral Clips Generator: https://tubegrow.io/viral-clips-generator
- Alternatives / Comparisons: https://tubegrow.io/alternatives
- Blog: https://tubegrow.io/blog
- About: https://tubegrow.io/about

product-highlights:
- AI chat assistant for channel insights
- Real-time analytics dashboards
- YouTube SEO analysis and optimization
- Viral moment detection and clip generation for Shorts/Reels/TikTok

contact:
email: support@tubegrow.io
